info.title: Travel Restrictions
info.description: Before using this API, we recommend you read our **[Authorization Guide](https://developers.amadeus.com/self-service/apis-docs/guides/authorization-262)** for more information on how to generate an access token.

2.0: First release of new major version

parameters.name: language
parameters.description:
Language code to get the result in given language. 
 Supported language code are: 
 * EN - English 
* ES - Spanish 
* DE - German
* JA - Japanese
* KO - Korean
* TH - Thai
* ID - Bahasa
* ZH - Chinese
* FR - French

data.summary: Authorities imposed international travel restrictions from late February 2020
data.hotspots: Minnesota, Michigan, Pennsylvania, New Jersey, Delaware, New York, Connecticut, Rhode Island, New Hampshire, Vermont, Massachusetts

areaRestrictions.text: A nightly nationwide curfew is in effect from 21:00-06:00 local time until further notice.

transportation.text: American Airlines, United Airlines, Delta Air Lines and other major carriers have suspended most flights to China, Hong Kong, Macau, the UK, continental Europe and Latin America. Officials partially lifted a ban on flights by Air China, China Eastern Airlines, China Southern Airlines, and Xiamen Airlines after Chinese authorities allowed United and Delta airlines to operate one round-trip between the two countries.

declarationDocumentations.text: Arriving travellers must complete a passenger locator form within 24 hours of arrival.

travelVaccination.exemptions: Entry Ban, Testing, Quarantine, Domestic Restrictions
qualifiedVaccines: Johnson & Johnson - 28 days after first dose.

entry.text: Travellers arriving from or transiting through India, South Africa, China, Iran, Brazil, Ireland, the United Kingdom and the European Schengen Area countries of Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Monaco, San Marin and Vatican City within 14 days of their planned arrival in the US are barred from entry.

diseaseTesting.text: All passengers on inbound international flights – including fully vaccinated people – must present a negative COVID-19 test result,Vaccinated travellers arriving from other countries must take PCR tests on day 4 and 8 after arrival.

tracingApplication.text: There is no national contact tracing app. Local authorities have developed or are developing optional platforms through Apple’s Exposure Notification API in multiple states, including Alabama, Arizona, California, Colorado, Delaware, Maryland, Michigan, Nevada, New York, North Carolina, North Dakota, Oregon, Pennsylvania, South Carolina, Virginia Washington and Wyoming, the District of Columbia, and territories, including Guam and Puerto Rico.

quarantineModality.text: International travellers are not required to quarantine upon arrival. However, the CDC recommends that travellers stay home and self-quarantine for 7 days after arrival. Travellers should take a test again 3-5 days after arrival; if a test is not available or results are delayed, travellers are recommended to stay home and self-quarantine for a total of 10 days after travelling.

masks.text: Some states and territories require residents to wear masks while out in public. Violators may be subject to fines and be denied entry to businesses and use of public transport. Most states and territories have voluntary measures or measures restricted to specific venues and municipalities.

exit.text: There are no exit restrictions though international travel is strongly discouraged.

otherRestrictions.text: Effective 23 April-20 May, a state of exception will be imposed in NYC

AreaPolicy.text: Limited federal policies for quarantine, testing and masking are in effect nationwide. Most policy decisions are implemented at the state, county and municipal level.

subArea.summary: Authorities were quick to impose curfew measures from mid-March 2020 .

400.description:
Bad Request

code    | title                                 
------- | ------------------------------------- 
4926    | INVALID DATA RECEIVED                          
32171   | MANDATORY DATA MISSING 
 477    | INVALID FORMAT
 572    | INVALID OPTION
2781    | INVALID LENGTH

errors.title: MANDATORY DATA MISSING
errors.detail: CONTENT IS MISSING IN THE GIVEN REQUEST, PLEASE CHECK AND RESEND YOUR REQUEST

code    | title                                 
------- | ------------------------------------- 
141     | SYSTEM ERROR HAS OCCURRED

501.description:
Not Implemented
code    | title                                 
------- | ------------------------------------- 
141     | UNABLE TO SUPPORT

specialRequirements.description: Yes/No/Yes conditional; indicates whether there are special requirements to fulfill in order to leave the country/territory

referenceLink.description:
Requirements to exit country 

Website information

isBanned.description: Yes/Recommended/Partial/No; 'Yes' indicates all travellers are banned from leaving; 'Recommended' indicates that travellers should not leave, but are mostly free to do so; 'Partial' indicates that some travellers may leave, but others are prevented; 'No' indicates all travellers are free to leave

ban.description: Indicates if entry for all or some types of people is banned. "Yes" includes situations that are equivalent to a ban

throughDate.description: Latest end date for entry ban. Date in YYYY-MM-DD format OR "indefinite" OR blank

referenceLink.description: Rules implied with specific to borders

bannedArea.description: Countries/territories from where travellers are generally banned from entry due to covid-19 rules. If no travellers are banned based on origin, this will be blank. Uses ISO 3166 country codes

eligiblePerson.description:
Who needs to Quarantine on Arrival 

eg Some travellers

duration.description: Minimum number of days for quarantine period.

mandateList.description:
Mandatory On Quarantine on Arrival 

eg Websites

quarantineOnArrivalAreas.description: Countries/territories from where travellers are generally required to quarantine on arrival. If no travellers are required to quarantine, this will be blank. Uses ISO 3166 country codes

isRequired.description: While Entering the Country we need a Government proposed APP

iosUrl.description: iOS URLS to Download the app

requirement.description:
Is the testing is required 

eg Mandatory,Yes.

referenceLink.description:
Rules regarding the testing 

eg https://corona.fo/quarantine.

isRequired.description:
Health Travel related declartaion Documentations 

eg Yes/No

isBanned.description: "Yes" or "No". Indicates if transpotation are allow or not.

throughDate.description: Latest end date for flight ban. Date in YYYY-MM-DD format OR "indefinite" OR blank

AreaAccessRestriction.title: Area Access Restriction
AreaAccessRestriction.description: Restriction applying to enter or leave the Area

status.description:
Current level of regional movement control. Can be de jure or de facto control. "Lockdown" | "Curfew" | "Distancing" | "None" | "Partial Measures" | "Opening" |
"Closing" | "Open"

endDate.description: Latest end date for current control measures. Date in YYYY-MM-DD format OR "indefinite" OR blank

DatedInformation.title: Dated Information
DatedInformation.description: Confirmed information at a given date

lastUpdate.description: It will display the last updated date

healthDepartmentSiteLink.description: Information about health Department Covid Site

DiseaseInfection.title: Disease Infection
DiseaseInfection.description: Confirmed infinction information at a given date

trend.description: Compares latest week to previous week. "Significant Decrease" | "Significant Increase" | "Decrease" | "Increase" | "Steady"

DiseaseCase.title: Disease Cases
DiseaseCase.description: Last confrmed picture at the given date

subAreas.description: it can be city or region

allOf.description: Description of a particular point or place in physical space
allOf.title: Location

name.description: Label associated to the location (e.g. Eiffel Tower, Madison Square)

geoCode.description: Geographic coordinates describing the position of any location on the surface of Earth
geoCode.title: GeoCode

latitude.description: Latitude of the position expressed in decimal degrees (WSG 84), e.g. 6.244203. A positive value denotes northern hemisphere or the equator, and a negative value denotes southern hemisphere. The number of digits to represent the precision of the coordinate.

longitude.description: Longitude of the position expressed in decimal degrees (WSG 84), e.g. -75.581211. A positive value denotes east longitude or the prime meridian, and a negative value denotes west longitude.  The number of digits to represent the precision of the coordinate.

methods.description: HTTP methods supported by the sibling URL

rel.description: Expose the type of relation between the current entity and the describe entity : https://www.iana.org/assignments/link-relations/link-relations.xhtml

vaccinationDoseStatus.description: Status of Vaccination dose status ,example one dose, fully vaccinated

percentage.description: Percent of population vaccinated based on the vaccination dose status

acceptedCertificates.description: List of accepted certificates. Not Specified/Paper Certificate/ and/or the name of the app

qualifiedVaccines.description: Vaccine types recognized by the country/territory. Each entry contains the vaccine's short name and the number of days after the first/second dose for full vaccination, i.e. AstraZeneca 14 days after second dose

details.description: Text explanation of the policies and exemptions for vaccinated travellers

minimumAge.description: Minimum age, in years, that a vaccine can be administered. Under this age, no vaccine is required

exemptionFromVaccination.description: Categories of travellers that do not require vaccination: "Aircrew", "Transit", "Diplomatic", "Transport", "Medical", "Short", "Urgent", "Family" Family or close relationship "Culture", "Sports", "Remote", "Commute", "Frequent", Citizen, Resident, Military, Seamen, Deported, Humanitarian, Healthcare, Disability, "Pregnant"

policy.description: Yes/No; 'Yes' indicates fully vaccinated travellers are exempt from some requirements or restrictions

exemptions.description: Entry Ban Testing Documents App Quarantine Masks Exit Domestic Restrictions; indicates what exemptions fully vaccinated travellers qualify for.

applicationGuidance.description: Text explanation of what activities and establishments require a entry pass

obtentionMethods.description: Text explanation of how to obtain the covid pass, if known.

referenceLink.description: URL to covid pass rules, web portal or app landing page

numberOfDoses.description: The number of doses required for full vaccination

delay.description: explain validity in terms of days,months or hours

name.description: Unique name that explains the scenario

isRequired.description: Is the health insurance needed ? YES/NO

minAmount.description: Minumum amount of Health Insurance needed

Meta.description: Meta information about the returned object(s) in "data"

links.description: Links related to the returned object(s)

code.description: A machine-readable error code from the Canned Messages table, that will enable the API Consumers code to handle this type of error

title.description: An error title from the Canned Messages table with a 1:1 correspondence to the error code. This may be localized

detail.description: An easy-to-read explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem. It should give the API consumer an idea of what went wrong and how to recover from it. Like the title, this field’s value can be localized.

parameter.description: The key of the URI path or query parameter that caused the error

pointer.description: A JSON Pointer [RFC6901] to the associated entity in the request body that caused this error

example.description: A sample input to guide the user when resolving this issue

status.description: The [HTTP status code](https://www.iana.org/assignments/http-status-codes/http-status-codes.xhtml) of this response. This is present only in terminal errors which cause an unsuccessful response. In the case of multiple errors, they must all have the same status.

code.description: A machine-readable error code from the Amadeus Canned Messages table, that will enable the API Consumers code to handle this type of error

title.description: An error title from the Canned Messages table with a 1:1 correspondence to the error code. This may be localized

detail.description: An easy-to-read explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem. It should give the API consumer an idea of what went wrong and how to recover from it. Like the title, this field’s value can be localized.

parameter.description: The key of the URI path or query parameter that caused the error

pointer.description: A JSON Pointer [RFC6901] to the associated entity in the request body that caused this error

example.description: A sample input to guide the user when resolving this issue
